column4: ok...went to: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu...ran: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install medibuntu-keyring && sudo apt-get update...got following error: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu...should I continue with installation attempt?
apparently cannot copy from terminal window
1) Ctrl-C doesn't work in gnome-terminal, do edit -> copy, 2) use paste.ubuntu.com
